analysis.description:

	External calls:

	- increaseRateValue (/unique_chucks/31/0x2c9fa4b91170f59632459f8a0474877a74c6815c.sol#649-650)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/31/0x2c9fa4b91170f59632459f8a0474877a74c6815c.sol#510-519) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/31/0x2c9fa4b91170f59632459f8a0474877a74c6815c.sol#515-517)

TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/31/0x2c9fa4b91170f59632459f8a0474877a74c6815c.sol#532-537) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/31/0x2c9fa4b91170f59632459f8a0474877a74c6815c.sol#534-536)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/31/0x2c9fa4b91170f59632459f8a0474877a74c6815c.sol#549-554) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (/unique_chucks/31/0x2c9fa4b91170f59632459f8a0474877a74c6815c.sol#553-554)
Parameter '_wallets' of SharesCrowdsale. (/unique_chucks/31/0x2c9fa4b91170f59632459f8a0474877a74c6815c.sol#600) is not in mixedCase
